data.message: Wut up shady, this is KK from the 702.. I don't know if you'll read this, but uh.. I jus gotta ask if u by any chance came across a rap that I wrote to ur beat Role Model, it's called Full Throttle. If so, I'd b so grateful to know what u thought about it. Thanks for everything you've expressed thru music, they've been motivational,  inspirational and most of all encouraging. Take care. - KK
